message: I create project "mm-init path_to_project --template=html5". This command generates files under public directory, but then mm-server command can not find template files. What do I do next?
Make sure you are running mm-server from your project directory
I was playing with this yesterday, too. mm-init [projname] --template=html5 doesn't appear to generate the layout directory under views/ .
Aha. It may have been because I was using the 1.2.8 gem. 2.0.0rc3 seems to make the directory structure I was expecting!
Sorry about that, the html5 stuff was pretty untested at the last v1 release.
Do I need to edit raw inde.html?
I use the 1.2.8 gem. I jumped up 2.0.0rc5 . mm-server works!
